column4: The following packages have been kept back: cryptsetup linux-generic linux-headers-generic linux-image-generic vlc vlc-nox vlc-plugin-pulse
why.. and how do i fix it?
sudo apt-get upgrade is giving me The following packages have been kept back: cryptsetup linux-generic linux-headers-generic linux-image-generic vlc vlc-nox vlc-plugin-pulse
how do i figure out what's causing the problem?
yes there is.. those packages arent updating
sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get upgrade && sudo apt-get dist-upgrade
you need to dist-upgrade to update those packages
dist-upgrade is NOT a version upgrade
oh well.. it's a vm.. if it goes fubar i'll just reinstall
and have been using dist-upgrade for years
you're now traveling down a very dangerous road.
if you'd like to /join #ubuntu-ops and tell my fellow channel operators that i'm flooding, feel free. :P
